class.name: agent.tasks.knowledges.ReconnoitreACrossingSite
class.description: The knowledge of the 'ReconnoiterACrossingSite' mission. This knowledge is used by the company commander to perform its own tasks.

method.name: getPionEfficiency
method.description: Returns the efficiency of the agent to perform the mission. The returned value is defined between '0' and '1'. A value of '0' means that the agent is not efficient at all. A value of '1' means that the agent is perfectly adapted to perform the mission.

argument.name: companyTask
argument.description: The string name of the company task.
